name: AVCaptureScreenInput
desc: A capture input for recording from a screen in macOS.

items.name: init?(displayID: CGDirectDisplayID)
items.desc: Initializes a capture screen input that provides media data from the specified display.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Initializes a capture screen input that provides media data from the main screen.

items.name: var minFrameDuration: CMTime
items.desc: The screen input's minimum frame duration.

items.name: var cropRect: CGRect
items.desc: Indicates the bounding rectangle of the screen area to be captured, in pixels.

items.name: var scaleFactor: CGFloat
items.desc: Indicates the factor by which video buffers captured from the screen are to be scaled.

items.name: var capturesCursor: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether the mouse cursor appears in the captured output.

items.name: var capturesMouseClicks: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether mouse clicks appear highlighted in the captured output.
